info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Transylvania and south central Henderson Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brevard, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Rosman, Looking Glass, Dupont State Forest, Little River In Transylvania County, Penrose, Connestee, Cedar Mountain, Balsam Grove and Sassafras Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
